item.description: This meeting will be our usual "birds of a feather" type of meeting, where folks who are interested in Linux come to share that interest with like minded folks. We have had great attendance recently and hopefully that will continue! Buy some coffee, tea, wine, dessert, soda, or water, and share your latest Linux activities with the group. People who have been coming regularly have a wide range of experiences and are very willing to share that with others and to help out less experienced Linux users. This is a friendly, outgoing group, and newcomers are most welcome. Drop in - we look forward to seeing you!
item.name: Linux @ The Java Room
